title: Behind the Scenes of 'Tokyo Vice' With Director Michael Mann
description:
This week, Chris is joined by The Ringer’s Juliet Litman to assemble their dream prime-time TV lineups (0:00). Then, Chris speaks with director Michael Mann about his work on the pilot episode for the HBO Max series ‘Tokyo Vice’ (34:37). Mann breaks down shooting on location in Japan, Japanese film, and more (46:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Juliet Litman, Michael Mann
Producer: Devon Renaldo 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
